name: Kids Station: Basic Soft
overview: Kids Station: Basic Soft is a game that was bundled with the Pen Tsuki Controller. Learn about colors as you draw characters and color them. When you draw these characters they will speak and/or answer to you. You can draw and enjoy basic learning with 92 hiragana and 50 charts that will empower your child's judgement on their sense of color. Have fun coloring and drawing with the Pen Tsuki Controller and show everyone your new creations! For ages 3 and up.
